TopicTitle: Docking Bug - Target speed increases for no reason.

Articles.Content:
>Running b9 5.2, KAS, hyperedit and Lasermod. x64

I know how to dock done it several times without any hickups the last few months , but i stumbled across something messed up lately. When reaching my target it speeds up for no reason! Even when i got pretty much the same AP PE! And it don't speed up with a few meters a second, it speeds up a couple of hundred of seconds and just flies away. Resulting switching ships bugging out, spacecenter button acting up and twice corrupting the persistent file. I tried starting over twice, for some crafts it works fine but with other crafts it just acts up.

Also tried to randevou with hyperedit with the same reaction.

Been trying to recreate it with vanilla installation but i haven't noticed any issues.

Why do my target fly away?

Edited September 13, 2014 by Iliketaco
